event_name: 2016 Championship Game of the WSA Future's Cup

players_involved.name: Charlotte Robison
players_involved.action: distribution — passes out from the back

players_involved.name: Sydney Shepelwich
players_involved.action: takes a touch and hits a great longball

players_involved.name: Caroline
players_involved.action: receives the longball, dribbles and creates space for a powerful shot

players_involved.name: Claire Briggs
players_involved.action: jumps on the rebound after the shot is parried

narrative: GK {Charlotte Robison} distribution to CB {Sydney Shepelwich}, longball to midfield, creative dribbling creates a powerful shot {Caroline} that's parried — and the rebound is pounced on by the LW {Claire Briggs}.
caption_hook: Building from the back the way Coach drew it up!
